title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 24 - Order (certification as a qualified adoptive parent)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 24 - Order (certification as a qualified adoptive parent)

State Regulations
D.R.L. §§ 115, 115-d Form
24
(Certification as

Qualified Adoptive

Parent)
12/97

At a term of the Surrogate's Court of
the

State of New York, held in and for
the

County of, at New York
on, 19. PRESENT: Hon. Judge
________
In the Matter of the Adoption of
(Docket)(File) No. A Child Whose First Name is
ORDER
(Certification as a

Qualified Adoptive
by Parent)

Adoptive Parent
________
NOTICE: THIS ORDER IS VALID ONLY
UNTIL
The petition of, verified the day of, 19, and filed in this court on the day of, 19, applying for certification as (a)
qualified parent(s) of the adoptive child above-named and a report having been
filed herein by, a disinterested person as defined in section
115-d
of the Domestic Relations Law

Now therefore upon consideration of said
report and all other relevant and material factors, it is hereby
(ORDERED that are certified as (a)
qualified adoptive parent(s) of the above-named adoptive child and may accept
physical custody of a child for the purposes of adoption prior to or
contemporaneous with the filing of an adoption petition.)
(ORDERED that the application by for
certification as (a) qualified adoptive parent(s) is hereby denied for the
following reasons:.)
ENTER
______________
Surrogate

Dated:, 19. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form
24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
